attributes.action: KEEP SCHOOLS CLOSED - UNTILL IT HAS BEEN PROVEN SAFE TO OPEN THEM!!
attributes.additional_details: Although Children and young people are less likely to catch COVID-19, it is important that children are 110% safe when returning back to school!
attributes.background: Keep the schools closed until it has been proven by stats that it is safe to reopen them!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571980
